column1: NGR is Woodside north of Llananno on the River Ithon the 1950s record has an NGR of SO095745, 650m SSE, which is at a higher altitudes and is away from the road; one of the records notes the gauge is close to the road.
Jan 1945 and Jan and Mar 1947 are noted as being part estimated for snow; readings have been left in this record
Dec 1949 and Jan 1950 are noted as having 8.5 inches apportioned between them; Readings removed
